description:
Daikichi`s cousin, Haruko, runs away from home to DaikichiÂ`s house with her daughter Reina in tow. Daikichi can hardly fathom Haruko`s determination, but when he does learn her reasons, he`s not a little surprised by how strong Haruko has become as a mother. It gets him thinking again about what marriage and family mean.
Source: crunchyroll
